channel.title: CVE Feed for Openfind -- Mail2000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Openfind -- Mail2000

item.title: CVE-2023-28705|2024-08-02T13:43:23.778Z -- openfind -- mail2000
item.description: Openfind Mail2000 has insufficient filtering special characters of email content of its content filtering function. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability using phishing emails that contain malicious web pages injected with JavaScript. When users access the system and open the email, it triggers an XSS (Reflected Cross-site scripting) attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-22902|2024-08-02T10:20:31.423Z -- openfind -- mail2000
item.description: Openfind Mail2000 file uploading function has insufficient filtering for user input. An authenticated remote attacker with general user privilege can exploit this vulnerability to inject JavaScript, conducting an XSS attack.
